channel.title: The MESG origin story
channel.description:
Many of you have been asking about how MESG was conceived and built, so today, we’re taking a deep dive into the origin story of MESG.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/the-mesg-origin-story/
